definitions.definition: The pointing of a weapon , as a gun , a dart , or an arrow , or object, in the line of direction with the object intended to be struck; the line of fire ; the direction of anything, such as a spear , a blow , a discourse , a remark , towards a particular point or object, with a view to strike or affect it.
examples: Take time with the aim of your gun.

definitions.definition: The point intended to be hit, or object intended to be attained or affected.

examples: My number one aim in life is to make money to make my parents, siblings , and kids happy.

definitions.definition: The ability of someone to aim straight; one’s faculty for being able to hit a physical target.
examples: The police officer has excellent aim , always hitting the bullseye in shooting practice.

main_definition: The pointing of a weapon , as a gun , a dart , or an arrow , or object, in the line of direction with the object intended to be struck; the line of fire ; the direction of anything, such as a spear , a blow , a discourse , a remark , towards a particular point or object, with a view to strike or affect it.
secondary_definitions: The point intended to be hit, or object intended to be attained or affected.
The ability of someone to aim straight; one’s faculty for being able to hit a physical target.

definitions.definition: Initialism of America Online AIM ; AOL Instant Messenger .

main_definition: Initialism of America Online AIM ; AOL Instant Messenger .
